alert.note: Alert for Brown; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 05 at 7:48AM MST until January 06 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON CST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Brown and Spink Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 3 AM to noon CST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 3 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
